title: Seed dispersal: seed dispersal by burial
brief_description: An educational documentary that examines the sowing of seeds, fertilisation and their eventual sprouting. Once sprouting has taken place the seeds are released from the grown plant.
description: An educational documentary that examines the sowing of seeds, fertilisation and their eventual sprouting. Once sprouting has taken place the seeds are released from the grown plant.
